title: Thomas Edison National Historical Park: Support Your Park
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Support Your Park             Support Your Park       You can help Thomas Edison National Historical Park in many different ways. You can:  Join one of the park partners, Make a donation to one of the park partners Purchase from the Eastern National Bookstore which supports park activities and learn more about the Park   Become a volunteer in our Volunteers-In-Parks Program (VIP) Take a tour or attend a special event Kids can earn their Jr. Ranger Badge either by visiting or online
